attributes.action: Apply "6 persons rule" to hunts and shoots
attributes.additional_details: The government's argument is that hunts and shoots are a sport and sports are exempt. Our argument is that they are not sports and are social activities and therefore social distancing rules should apply.
attributes.background: Under recent legislation, a "6 person rule" has been implemented. This rule makes it illegal to meet socially in a group of more than 6, including children, illegal. Hunts and shoots are exempt, this should also be illegal.
